The photo of the painted rock was posted: 2019, and has been shared more than 2,000 times.
The Sinhala text in the image: when translated to English, states that the painting was done by a group of boys on a rock in Jungle beach.
The claim that the painting is on Jungle: The painting is actually located in Goa, India, and was completed by an American artist named Jimmy Swift.
A reverse Google image search led to an: 2018, featuring an identical image of the rock painting by Jimmy Swift, confirming the authenticity of the claim.
